MacroOp.Name: OMNI_THREAD_FNPTR_T
MacroOp.Brief: Defines the thread function pointer type used by the framework.
MacroOp.Description: A framework macro/option that changes certain functionality
MacroOp.Synopsis: Defines the thread function pointer type used by the framework. For more information on it, see @h omni/types/thread_t.hpp @h and @h omni/defs/thread_def.hpp @h
